entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
